issue.title: [CF 230] Icontexture for "PvP-Trinket"
issue.body:
Hello, i use Cooldown - Others for tracking the enemys pvp-trinkets. probleme there is , i get a wrong texture if the trinket is poped. i see a purple spell texture, not the original texture of the pvp-trinket item.

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SUnit^Sarena1 ^SType^Sunitcooldown ^SOnlySeen^B ^SShowWhen^Sunalpha ^SEnabled^B ^SName^SPvP-Schmuckst√ºck ^SICDDuration^N120 ^t^N43106^^

german wow client, tmw alpha r115

p.s. if i use your spell-ids provided for "pvp-trinkets" in another addon (Nameplateadvance) it allways shows the alliance pvp-trinket texture, which is perfect. just tmw icons will show this wrong, purple texture.


> Posted by CurseForge user Rhyn23 | Imported from CurseForge issue #230 | Raw

comments.body:
It isn't technically wrong - that is the actual texture used by the spell that pvp trinkets use. If you watch very carefully, it will appear in a person's buffs for a split second after they use their pvp trinket. I suppose that I could hack it in, though...


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
